extDescription.message: Scrobble music all around the web!

optionUseNotificationsTitle.message: Show now playing notifications for all supported websites

optionUnrecognizedNotifications.message: Notify if track is not recognized

optionUnrecognizedNotificationsTitle.message: Show notification if track is not recognized by the extension

optionTdlShortTrackNamesTitle.message: Tidal provides shortened track names for certain tracks (without "Remastered", etc.)

optionYtDesc.message: If you turn off both options, the extension will scrobble Youtube videos from all categories.

optionPercentDesc.message: Note that a track will be scrobbled anyway, if it has been played for 4 minutes, regardless of the option value.

optionYtMusicOnlyTitle.message: Ignore videos that are not in Music category

optionYtEntertainmentOnlyTitle.message: Ignore videos that are not in Entertainment category

connectorsDescription.message: A connector is a part of the extension that transforms information of a now playing track on a website to an extension-friendly format. Each connector covers one or more websites.

connectorsEnableDisableHint.message: Click on the switches to enable/disable connectors.

connectorsCustomPatternsHint.message: Click on the gear icon to configure custom URL patterns for connectors.
connectorsCustomPatternsHint.description: Description of how to configure custom URL patterns

storageScrobbleStorageDescDefault.message: Here you can view, edit, scrobble or remove all of tracks were not scrobbled.
storageScrobbleStorageDescDefault.description: Scrobble storage description when at least one song is saved

storageScrobbleStorageDescNoSongs.description: Scrobble storage description when no songs are saved

faqGetStartedQuestion.message: How can I start using the extension?

faqGetStartedAnswerA.message: Just click on a notification displayed when the extension is started, then grant access to your accounts.

faqGetStartedAnswerB.message: Note: In some cases, the notification won't be shown, e.g. on Mac OS if Chrome is running in full-screen mode; the extension will open a tab where you can grant access to your accounts.

faqGetStartedAnswerC.message: The notification is displayed up to 3 times after the extension is installed, but you can open the options page at any time, where you can manage your accounts.

faqGetStartedAnswerD.message: After you granted access to your accounts you can open any of websites supported by the extension and start listening to music.

faqDisableScrobblingQuestion.message: How do I temporarily disable scrobbling?

faqDisableScrobblingAnswerA.message: Right-click on the extension icon in the extension bar to open a context menu, then disable scrobbling for a current website via this context menu.

faqDisableScrobblingAnswerB.message: Use switches in the "Connectors" tab to disable a certain connector, or the "Toggle" switch to disable scrobbling globally.

faqTrackNotRecognizedQuestion.message: The track was not recognized! Can you fix it?

faqTrackNotRecognizedAnswerA.message: When a track cannot be recognized, the extension displays a gray icon with question mark in the extension bar. Clicking on this icon will open a popup window, where you can submit the correct information.

faqTrackNotRecognizedAnswerB.message: Also, there's a "Force track recognition" option that makes the extension to force scrobbling a track even if it's is not recognized by Last.fm.

faqBandcampDomainsQuestion.message: Some music on Bandcamp cannot be scrobbled. Is it possible to fix this?

faqBandcampDomainsAnswerA.message: Looks like the music is hosted on a custom domain and the extension cannot detect whether it’s Bandcamp or not.

faqBandcampDomainsAnswerB.message: As a workaround, configure the extension to work with custom domains as follows:

faqBandcampDomainsAnswerB1.message: Open the extension options page and select the "Connectors" tab.

faqBandcampDomainsAnswerB2.message: Find the Bandcamp connector in the list of supported websites.

faqBandcampDomainsAnswerB3.message: Click on the gear icon near the connector label.

faqBandcampDomainsAnswerB4.message: Add a URL pattern that matches the Bandcamp custom domain URL and apply the changes.

faqAddScrobblingQuestion.message: Will you add support for scrobbling at ____ ?

faqAddScrobblingAnswerA.message: Open a new issue on GitHub with your request, and we'll tell you if we can add support for the website or not. Also, you can add support for the website by forking the GitHub repository and sending us a pull request.

faqWhoIsAuthorAnwserA.message: The original author of this extension is David Šabata. Now this extension is developed and maintained by Web Scrobbler Team.

aboutExtensionDesc.message: Web Scrobbler helps online music listeners to scrobble their playback history.

aboutShowSomeLoveText.message: The extension is free, and will always be free. But if you want to support development of the extension, you can use the button below.

getStartedHeader.message: Play some music to get started

getStartedSiteChanged.message: In most cases this means the site has changed somehow. The change does not have to be visible to user, but means a lot to the extension.
getStartedSiteChanged.description: Description of why track is not recognized

getStartedSubmitIssue.message: The connector code for this specific website needs to be updated. You can navigate to the list of issues and see if this website is already reported. If it is not, you can submit a new issue describing what's wrong, what's expected behavior and what's happening instead.
getStartedSubmitIssue.description: Description of how to submit new issue

serviceErrorDesc.message: Looks like something went wrong while scrobbling the music. Please open the options page and try to reauthenticate with services. If reauthentication doesn't help, and you still see this message, please create a new issue at the GitHub project page.

disabledSiteDesc.message: The extension won't scrobble music from this website until you turn it on in the extension options.

unsupportedWebsiteDesc.message: Web Scrobbler does not support scrobbling from this website.

unsupportedWebsiteDesc2.message: Some Google websites supported by the extension (e.g. Google Play Music, YouTube) can be blocked due to an ExtensionSettings policy.

infoSwapUnableTitle.message: You cannot swap empty track info

infoSubmitUnableTitle.message: You cannot submit empty track info

infoOpenAlbumArt.message: Open album art in new tab

pageActionBase.message: This site is supported for scrobbling

pageActionDisabled.message: This site is supported for scrobbling, but you disabled it

pageActionUnknown.message: The track is not recognized. Click to submit correct info.

pageActionError.message: A service error occurred. Click for more information.

pageActionUnsupported.message: Web Scrobbler does not support this website.

menuDisableUntilTabClosed.message: Disable $1 connector until tab is closed

notificationConnectAccountsText.message: Click the notification to connect your accounts.

notificationUnableSignIn.message: Unable to sign in to $1. Please try later.

notificationNotRecognizedText.message: Click on the icon in the extensions bar to correct and submit track info.

patternsCustomPatternsHint.message: Add URL patterns that the connector should match.
